description: The perfect Wall Decal for nursery decorations fully customizable name dÃ©cor for walls. You can choose from our 3 different sizes and customize the name and colors as you wish.
Our premium wall decals come pre-cut and do not require any additional hardware or purchase for application.
We can print anything you like. It can be a wall decoration, an insignia or something of your own creation. With your creative mind, only the sky is the limit.

- Wipe your wall and make sure it's clean, oil free, smooth and dry before you apply the decal onto it. - Slowly peel the sticker and apply to the surface carefully. - Use a hard-Plastic ID card to scrape over the applied sticker to remove bubbles if any. - 2-person installation recommended.
Do not apply wall decals on a newly painted surface, if so, wait for 4 weeks to dry. Make sure the package is not damaged in any way.
